评论详情: I love this top. Only 4 stars because you have to iron it.

The top is very colorful but well done and it arrived in good condition, though a bit wrinkled.  I am going to have to have it altered as it is pretty long and I am pretty short.  One thing - the verbiage about the top said it was cotton in one place and rayon in another place - it is in fact rayon.  I look forward to wearing it as a fun summer outfit.
Love the color, love the fit.
Very pretty embroidery, great style, and the material is awesome.  The lining is appreciated, too!
This top fit perfectly and is well made.  I’ve ordered two.
Well made. True to size. 200 lb. - XL. Goes well with leggings or jeans.
I am taking this shirt on a vacation overseas. I think it will look great with jeans!
Very comfortable and the colors are beautiful.  I’ve received many compliments.  It didn’t shrink or wrinkle, but I air dried it.

It’s a beautiful blouse I originally ordered a large washed it in delicate cold hung dry and it shrunk considerably.  The price for this blouse isn’t cheap so it shouldn’t shrink like that.  Ordered another one size XL let’s see what happens when I wash this one.
Very comfortable.. could have ordered a size smaller.. vibrant colors
Lite weight, covers my 70 yr old arms nicely.  Like the red and the embroidery is done nicely.

I bought  this in medium and it was huge everywhere except in the bust/shoulder area.  I bought it in small and it was way too tight in the bust shoulder/upper back area and still a little too boxy everywhere else.  Too bad because the embroidery was beautiful and I loved the pattern.  For reference I'm 5'3 and 123 lbs and am a 36 C
I like this top the embroidery is beautiful..
I got complemented by many the day I wore this shirt. Very comfortable and fits perfectly.
This blouse is simply beautiful! Several friends (who would know) mistook it for the designer original! Beautifully made.

I'm a fan. Of course it is not as nice as a Jonny Was, but my gosh....look at the price! It fits nicely, will be super cute with some white jeans. It does look like a more expensive Johnny Was blouse...I usually take a medium/large and the medium fit me. 36D, 150lbs.
